name: GlobalVision Systems
overview: GlobalVision Systems, Inc. provides enterprise-wide compliance and risk management solutions for financial institutions. It offers PATRIOT OFFICER, an artificial intelligence-based system that assists bankers to meet the requirements of the USA PATRIOT Act; and GUARDIAN OFFICER, an artificial intelligence-based fraud solution. The company also provides Policy Manager, an instant publisher and official library that provides the organizations with policies, manuals, and guidelines through the Internet or Intranet; and Report Manager, a browser-based report system that guarantees user access to reports through the Internet or Intranet. In addition, it offers Image Manager, an integrated document and check image storage system that makes images available to users; Collaboration Center that enables executives, managers, officers, and clerks to collaborate their efforts in managing new and existing customers; and Customer Evaluator, an integrated system that provides a summary of all the background and financial information of a customer. Further, the company provides Portfolio Manager, a platform to customize a portfolio management system for managers in different departments; Information Explorer, an explorer that enables users to mine a data warehouse; and Trade Master, a browser-based international trade finance system that facilitates bankers to conduct international business with importers and exporters. GlobalVision Systems, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Chatsworth, California.
